items.content_html: A simple countdown timer application built with Vite and React. Users can easily edit the countdown time, start and stop the timer as needed. This lightweight and responsive app provides a convenient way to track time for various purposes.
items.title: GauravSinghGkp/Countdown-Timer: A simple countdown timer application built with Vite and React. Users can easily edit the countdown time, start and stop the timer as needed. This lightweight and responsive app provides a convenient way to track time for various purposes.

items.content_html: Forge is a lightweight and user-friendly React form library designed to streamline the form-building process with simplicity and clarity in mind. Built on top of the robust react-hook-form library, Forge takes the hassle out of form management, offering an intuitive and clean setup that accelerates your development workflow.
items.title: adexdsamson/Forge: Forge is a lightweight and user-friendly React form library designed to streamline the form-building process with simplicity and clarity in mind. Built on top of the robust react-hook-form library, Forge takes the hassle out of form management, offering an intuitive and clean setup that accelerates your development workflow.

items.content_html: Thinu-CMS is a lightweight and user-friendly PHP blog system that simplifies content management for bloggers and website owners. With its intuitive interface and robust features, Thinu-CMS empowers users to create and manage their blogs effortlessly, making it the ideal platform for sharing thoughts and ideas online.

With its intuitive interface and robust features, Thinu-CMS empowers users to create and manage their blogs effortlessly, making it the ideal platform for sharing thoughts and ideas online.

items.content_html: 🏠 A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your CloudFree "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central as a pure virtual appliance (under Proxmox VE, Home Assistant, Docker/OCI, LXC, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on your own device (e.g. RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, intelNUC, etc.)
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your CloudFree "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central as a pure virtual appliance (under Proxmox VE, Home Assistant, Docker/OCI, LXC, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on your own device (e.g. RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, intelNUC, etc.)
